Connected Textures
1. 裝ModLoader
2. 把MOD壓縮檔內的Base文件夾中的東西全丟進minecraft.jar
3. 想用玻璃,箱子,沙岩, 就把glass, chests, sandstone文件夾中的.class文件丟進minecraft.jar
4. 想安裝材質包, 下載Texture Template v1.1.3.png圖檔, 將它改名為ctm.png, 並丟進材質包中的EITHER文件夾(或丟進minecraft.jar)

Dynamic Lights 
1. 找到minecraft.jar
2. 備份minecraft.jar
3. 用檿縮軟件打開minecraft.jar
4. 刪除META-INF
5. 把MOD壓縮檔內compiled_put_this_into_minecraft_jar文件夾中的東西全丟進minecraft.jar
6. 把MOD壓縮檔內configfile_put_this_into_.minecraft_folder文件夾中的東西全丟進/.minecraft, 這是設置文件
7. 進遊戲試試

merged files 放的是 optimine + optifog 1.6.6C ,看你要不要再多裝這個MOD
source 放的是它的源碼, 除非你想研究... 
CREDIT.txt 是作者聲明文件
REQUIRES RISUGAMIS MODLOADER.txt 是提醒你裝ModLoader

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
Connected Textures
1. Download and install Risugami's ModLoader.
2. Download the mod, and drag the files from the "Base" folder directly into minecraft.jar - don't drag in the folder!
3. To use the mod for glass, chests, sandstone, drag the .class files from their respective folders into minecraft.jar.
4. To install files for texture packs, download the .png from this thread, rename it "ctm.png" and drag it into EITHER the folder of the texture pack OR minecraft.jar. (if the link for the .png in this thread says [built-in] in it then the ctm.png is already included in the texture pack's .zip and you can ignore this step).


Dynamic Lights 
1) Locate your minecraft.jar file. On Windows, it's in %APPDATA%/.minecraft/bin
2) Create a backup of minecraft.jar
3) Open minecraft.jar in an archive editor (WinRar/7-Zip/etc)
4) Delete the META-INF folder.
5) Copy everything your find in the zip's "compiled..." folder into your JAR, replacing files and folders
6) Copy the settings file into your /.minecraft folder, edit it if you please
6) Run Minecraft and test!
